title: Hailey Bieber glows in a newly released reception photo of her gorgeous custom Vera Wang dress
text:
They tied the knot for the second time late last month.

Now new photos from Hailey and Justin Bieber's celeb-packed ceremony have emerged on Instagram.

The 22–year–old model looked as if she was having the time of her life in photos showcasing her custom Vera Wang dress from the wedding reception.

Dance party: New photos of Hailey Bieber, 22, and Justin Bieber, 25, feature the model's custom Vera Wang gown, which she paired with some comfy white sneakers

Hailey hit the dance floor in her shimmering pearl white Vera Wang gown, which reached down to the floor.

The outfit featured thick straps, one of which had fallen down around her arm in the commotion, and the low-cut top highlighted the catwalk star's cleavage.

The 5ft7in beauty was looking to stay on the dance floor as long as possible, so she changed into a more comfortable pair of white sneakers.

White knight: Justin shared a photo on Tuesday of himself helping Hailey change out of her delicate white Jimmy Choo heels

The lovely black and white photo was shared on Instagram by Hailey's stylist Maeve Rielly.

'The happiest bride I ever did see. Thank you @verawanggang for @haileybieber custom dress she danced the night away in. And yes duh- sneakers,' she wrote in the caption.

Justin had previously shared photos of the dress to his account on Tuesday, though the outfit wasn't clearly displayed.

The Sorry singer was crouched down as he helped his bride switch out of her heels into the much more comfortable sneakers.

Legs for days: Hailey started off the reception in a custom Ralph & Russo gown with a high slit showcasing her svelte legs

Subsequent photos from Reilly showcased another gorgeous gown that Hailey appears to have worn at the start of the reception.

The similar look was custom designed by Ralph & Russo. Unlike her Vera Wang outfit, this dress showcased Hailey's svelte legs thanks to a high slit.

The gown featured a ruched torso, and the halter top wrapped around her throat.

Hailey started the night out with a fancier pair of white Jimmy Choo open-toe heels before tossing them aside.

Second time around: Justin and Hailey's religious ceremony took place September 30 at the Palmetto Bluff Hotel in Bluffton, South Carolina, and featured celebrity guests Kendall Jenner, Usher and Jaden Smith

Justin and Hailey's religious ceremony took place September 30 at the Palmetto Bluff Hotel in Bluffton, South Carolina.

Though there were plenty of celebrity guests, the actual ceremony took place in a chapel that only seated 100 guests.

Among the guests were Hailey's BFF Kendall Jenner and her younger sister Kylie, with Fay Khadra and Jaden Smith as their respective guests.

R&B singer Usher was also present at the festivities, as were Hailey's cousin Ireland Baldwin, Leonardo DiCaprio's girlfriend Camila Morrone and Justin's manager Scooter Braun.

Woman in white: Hailey walked down the aisle in a custom gown designed by Off-White's Virgil Abloh

The dress Hailey walked down the aisle was designed by Off-White's Virgil Abloh.

She paired the lacy off–the–shoulder gown with a sheer veil over her delicately coiffed blonde tresses.

'@virgilabloh thank you for making my vision come to life and creating my dream dress,' she captioned a snap of the outfit.

'You and your @off____white team are incredible and I’m forever grateful I got to wear your beautiful creation ❤️.'
description: Newly released photos of Hailey Bieber show the model's custom Vera Wang gown from her wedding reception. She switched into a pair of sneakers to dance the night away.
